00009 const SimpleString VariableAttribute::access_constant_str = "constant";
00010 const SimpleString VariableAttribute::access_read_str = "read";
00011 const SimpleString VariableAttribute::access_readwrite_str = "readWrite";

00016 {

00018     Initialised = false;

00028 const SimpleString& VariableAttribute::AccessToStr(VariableAccessType a)
00029 {
00030     if(a == ConstantAccess) return access_constant_str;
00031     if(a == ReadAccess) return access_read_str;
00032     return access_readwrite_str;
00033 }

00041 void VariableAttribute::GenerateShortDescription(SimpleString& str)
00042 {
00043     GenerateHeaderDescription(variable_str, GetName(), str);
00044 }
00045
00046 void VariableAttribute::GenerateLongDescription(SimpleString& str)
00047 {
00048     GenerateHeaderDescription(variable_str, GetName(), str, false);
00049
00050     str += "<value>";
00051     PutAValueInCData(GetValue(), str);
00052     str += "</value>";
00053     if(defaultValue != "")
00054     {
00055         str += "<default>";
00056         PutAValueInCData(defaultValue, str);
00057         str += "</default>";
00058     }
00059
00060     str = str + "<access>"+AccessToStr(access)+"</access>";
00061     str = str + "<type>"+type+"</type>";
00062     AddTagDescriptionToStr(str);
00063     str = str + "</variable>";
00064 }

00079 void VariableAttribute::Display()
00080 {
00081     printf("Name : %s\n", GetName().GetStr() );
00082     printf("Type : %s\n", type.GetStr());
00083     printf("Default Value : %s\n", defaultValue.GetStr());
00084     printf("Last Value : %s\n", valueStr.GetStr());
00085     printf("Access : %s\n", AccessToStr(access).GetStr());
00086 }

00088
00089 void VariableAttribute::SetValue(const SimpleString value_str)
00090 {
00091     // ask to all listener if we can change the value
00092     Listeners.Lock();
00093     for( Listeners.First(); Listeners.NotAtEnd(); Listeners.Next() )
00094     {
00095         VariableAttributeListener * pListener = Listeners.GetCurrent();
00096         if ( pListener->IsValid( this, value_str ) == false )
00097         {
00098             // someone disagree
00099             Listeners.Unlock();
00100             // OmiscidError( "VariableAttribute::SetValue: someone disagree on variable change\n");
00101             return;
00102         }
00103     }
00104
00105     // Ok, change my value
00106     valueStr = value_str;
00107
00108     // Initialised !!
00109     Initialised = true;
00110
00111     // Ok the value has change, send information back to people
00112     for( Listeners.First(); Listeners.NotAtEnd(); Listeners.Next() )
00113     {
00114         Listeners.GetCurrent()->VariableChanged( this );
00115     }
00116
00117     Listeners.Unlock();
00118 }

00120 void VariableAttribute::SetValueFromControl(const SimpleString value_str)
00121 {
00122     // Ok, change my value
00123     valueStr = value_str;
00124
00125     // Initialised !!
00126     Initialised = true;
00127
00128     // Ok the value has change, send information back to people
00129     Listeners.Lock();
00130     for( Listeners.First(); Listeners.NotAtEnd(); Listeners.Next() )
00131     {
00132         Listeners.GetCurrent()->VariableChanged( this );
00133     }
00134
00135     Listeners.Unlock();
00136 }

00138 void VariableAttribute::ExtractDataFromXml(xmlNodePtr node)
00139 {
00140
00141     xmlAttrPtr attr_name = XMLMessage::FindAttribute("name", node);
00142     if(attr_name)
00143     {
00144         SetName(SimpleString((const char*)attr_name->children->content));
00145     }
00146
00147     //child value
00148     SimpleString tmp_value("");
00149     xmlNodePtr cur_node = node->children;
00150     for(; cur_node; cur_node = cur_node->next)
00151     {
00152         if (cur_node->type == XML_ELEMENT_NODE)
00153         {
00154             SimpleString cur_name = (const char*)cur_node->name;
00155             if( cur_name == "description" )
00156             {
00157                 SetDescription(XMLMessage::ExtractTextContent(cur_node->children));
00158             }
00159             else if( cur_name == "formatDescription" )
00160             {
00161                 SetFormatDescription(XMLMessage::ExtractTextContent(cur_node->children));
00162             }
00163             else if ( cur_name == "value" )
00164             {
00165                 tmp_value = XMLMessage::ExtractTextContent(cur_node->children);
00166                 //vattr->SetValue((const char*)cur_node->children->content);
00167             }
00168             else if ( cur_name == "default" )
00169             {
00170                 SetDefaultValue(XMLMessage::ExtractTextContent(cur_node->children));
00171             }
00172             else if ( cur_name == "type" )
00173             {
00174                 SetType(XMLMessage::ExtractTextContent(cur_node->children).GetStr());
00175             }
00176             else if ( cur_name == "access" )
00177             {
00178                 SimpleString content = XMLMessage::ExtractTextContent(cur_node->children);
00179                 if( content == access_read_str )
00180                 {
00181                     SetAccessRead();
00182                 }
00183                 else if( content == access_readwrite_str )
00184                 {
00185                     SetAccessReadWrite();
00186                 }
00187                 else if( content == access_constant_str )
00188                 {
00189                     SetAccessConstant();
00190                 }
00191                 else
00192                 {
00193                     OmiscidError( "Unknow Access kind : %s\n", cur_node->children->content );
00194                 }
00195             }
00196             else OmiscidError( "Unwaited Tag : %s\n", cur_name.GetStr() );
00197         }
00198     }
00199
00200     SetValue(tmp_value);
00201 }

00233 SimpleString& VariableAttribute::GetValue()
00234 {
00235     if ( Initialised == false )
00236     {
00237         SimpleString TmpString;
00238         TmpString = GetName();
00239         TmpString += " not initialised";
00240         throw  SimpleException( TmpString );
00241     }
00242     return valueStr;
00243 }

00260 bool VariableAttribute::CanBeModifiedFromInside(ControlServerStatus status) const
00261 {
00262     if ( access == ConstantAccess && status == STATUS_RUNNING )
00263     {
00264         return false;
00265     }
00266     return true;
00267 }
00268
00269  bool VariableAttribute::CanBeModifiedFromOutside(ControlServerStatus status) const
00270 {
00271     return (access == ReadWriteAccess || (access == ConstantAccess && status != STATUS_RUNNING));
00272 }

00277 bool VariableAttribute::AddListener( VariableAttributeListener * ListenerToAdd )
00278 {
00279     if ( ListenerToAdd == NULL )
00280     {
00281         return false;
00282     }
00283
00284     Listeners.Lock();
00285     // look if it is already there..
00286     for( Listeners.First(); Listeners.NotAtEnd(); Listeners.Next() )
00287     {
00288         if ( Listeners.GetCurrent() == ListenerToAdd )
00289         {
00290             Listeners.Unlock();
00291             return false;
00292         }
00293     }
00294
00295     // add it
00296     Listeners.Add( ListenerToAdd );
00297
00298     Listeners.Unlock();
00299
00300     return true;
00301 }
00302
00306 bool VariableAttribute::RemoveListener( VariableAttributeListener *  ListenerToAdd )
00307 {
00308     bool ret;
00309
00310     if ( ListenerToAdd == NULL )
00311     {
00312         return false;
00313     }
00314
00315     // Remove it if any
00316     Listeners.Lock();
00317     ret = Listeners.Remove(ListenerToAdd);
00318     Listeners.Unlock();
00319
00320     return ret;
00321 }
00322
00323 unsigned int VariableAttribute::GetNumberOfListeners()
00324 {
00325     unsigned int ret;
00326
00327     Listeners.Lock();
00328     ret = Listeners.GetNumberOfElements();
00329     Listeners.Unlock();
00330
00331     return ret;
00332 }
